Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: Name of the public key to be imported. The value does not need to be unique.
Name.markdownDescription:
Name of the public key to be imported. The value does not need to be unique.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-_]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

PublicKeyMaterial.description: The public portion of a customer-generated key pair.
PublicKeyMaterial.markdownDescription:
The public portion of a customer-generated key pair.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: -----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----\r?\n([a-zA-Z0-9+/=\r\n]+)\r?\n-----END PUBLIC KEY-----(\r?\n)?  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset model.
Tags.markdownDescription:
A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset model.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Fingerprint.markdownDescription:
Key-pair identifier.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
Key-pair identifier.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:ivs:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]+:public-key/[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
